thread.title: Developing DNA as a Standard for Authenticating Art

title: Developing DNA as a Standard for Authenticating Art
text:
Published By: NYTimes Arts - Today 
A new method of authenticating artwork uses manufactured DNA to give each piece a unique identifier....
